jd: From: Deepika Dua, Stellar Consulting Solutions LLC deepika.dua@stellarconsulting.com Reply to: deepika.dua@stellarconsulting.com HiMy name is Deepika & I am a recruiter at Stellar Consulting, and I came across your profile while looking for qualified candidates for a Project Manager role. Below are the job details for your reference.Job Title : Project ManagerLocation : RemoteDuration : Long term Job Summary:Experienced project manager of 6+ years responsible for planning, directing, and managing product or client implementation of self-funded clients in the Healthcare Payer Plan AdministrationProject manager who has worked Plan Administration ( Claims Integration with BlueCross or CIGNA/AETNA, Claims Administration and payments, Billing & Invoicing, Vendor Carrier Integration, Provider Data management & Contract implementation)Project manager with work experience handling 30+ Vendors integration (Medical, Dental Carriers, Pharmacy, Health & Wellness, Telehealth, Clearing House) Deepika DuaSr. Technical Recruiter at Stellar Consulting Solutions, LLCPhone: +1 678-935-7075Email: deepika.dua@stellarconsulting.comLinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/deepika-dua-018459166/
